31struct vec2
32{
33 union
34 {
35 struct
36 {
37 float x, y;
38 };
39 float v[2];
40 };
41
42 vec2() {}
43 vec2(float x, float y) : x(x), y(y) {}
44 explicit vec2(const vec &v);
45 explicit vec2(const vec4<float> &v);
46
47 float &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
48 float operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
49
50 bool operator==(const vec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
51 bool operator!=(const vec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
52
53 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
54 float dot(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
55 float squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
56 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
57 vec2 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
58 vec2 &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
59 float cross(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
60 float squaredist(const vec2 &e) const { return vec2(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
61 float dist(const vec2 &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
62
63 vec2 &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; }
64 vec2 &mul(const vec2 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; return *this; }
65 vec2 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
66 vec2 &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; }
67 vec2 &div(const vec2 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; return *this; }
68 vec2 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; return *this; }
69 vec2 &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; }
70 vec2 &add(const vec2 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; return *this; }
71 vec2 &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; }
72 vec2 &sub(const vec2 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; return *this; }
73 vec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
74 vec2 &min(const vec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
75 vec2 &max(const vec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
76 vec2 &min(float f) { x = ::min(x, f); y = ::min(y, f); return *this; }
77 vec2 &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); return *this; }
78 vec2 &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); return *this; }
79 vec2 &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); return *this; }
80 vec2 &reflect(const vec2 &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; return *this; }
81 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; return *this; }
82 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &a, const vec2 &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; return *this; }
83 vec2 &avg(const vec2 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
84
85 vec2 operator+(const vec2 &v2) const
86 {
87 return vec2(x+v2.x, y+v2.y);
88 }
89
90 vec2 operator-(const vec2 &v2) const
91 {
92 return vec2(x-v2.x, y-v2.y);
93 }

96 {
97 return vec2(-x, -y);

128 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
129 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
130 vec2 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }

142struct vec
143{
144 union
145 {
146 struct
147 {
148 float x, y, z;
149 };
150 struct
151 {
152 float r, g, b;
153 };
154 float v[3];
155 };
156
157 vec() {}
158 explicit vec(int a) : x(a), y(a), z(a) {}
159 explicit vec(float a) : x(a), y(a), z(a) {}
160 vec(float a, float b, float c) : x(a), y(b), z(c) {}
161 explicit vec(int v[3]) : x(v[0]), y(v[1]), z(v[2]) {}
162 explicit vec(const float *v) : x(v[0]), y(v[1]), z(v[2]) {}
163 explicit vec(const vec2 &v, float z = 0) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(z) {}
164 explicit vec(const vec4<float> &v);
165 explicit vec(const ivec &v);
166 explicit vec(const svec &v);
167
168 vec(float yaw, float pitch) : x(-std::sin(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), y(cosf(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), z(std::sin(pitch)) {}
169 vec &set(int i, float f) { v[i] = f; return *this; }
170
171 //operator overloads
172 float &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
173 float operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
174 bool operator==(const vec &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y && z == o.z; }
175 bool operator!=(const vec &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y || z != o.z; }
176
177 vec operator+(const vec &v2)
178 {
179 return vec(x+v2.x, y+v2.y, z+v2.z);
180 }
181
182 vec operator-(const vec &v2)
183 {
184 return vec(x-v2.x, y-v2.y, z-v2.z);
185 }
186
187 vec operator-()
188 {
189 return vec(-x, -y, -z);
190 }
191
192 template<typename T>
193 vec operator*(const T &n)
194 {
195 return vec(n*x, n*y, n*z);
196 }
197
198 vec operator*(const vec &v2)
199 {
200 return vec(x*v2.x, y*v2.y, z*v2.z);
201 }

204 vec operator/(const T &n)
205 {
206 return vec(x/n, y/n, z/n);

209 vec operator/(const vec &v2)
210 {
211 return vec(x/v2.x, y/v2.y, z/v2.z);

215 //unary operators
216 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
217 float squaredlen() const { return x*x + y*y + z*z; }
218 vec &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
219 vec &neg2() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; } //unused
220 vec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; } //overloaded by operator-()
221 vec &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); z = fabs(z); return *this; }
222 vec &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; return *this; } //used twice
223 float magnitude2() const { return sqrtf(dot2(*this)); }
224 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
225 vec &normalize() { div(magnitude()); return *this; }
226 vec &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) div(m); return *this; }
227 bool isnormalized() const { float m = squaredlen(); return (m>0.99f && m<1.01f); }
228
229 //elementwise float operators
230 vec &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
231 vec &mul2(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; } //unused
232 vec &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
233 vec &div2(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; } //unused
234 vec &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
235 vec &add2(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; } //used once
236 vec &addz(float f) { z += f; return *this; } //unused
237 vec &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
238 vec &sub2(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; } //unused
239 vec &subz(float f) { z -= f; return *this; } //unused
240 vec &min(float f) { x = ::min(x, f); y = ::min(y, f); z = ::min(z, f); return *this; }
241 vec &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); z = ::max(z, f); return *this; }
242 vec &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }
243
244 //elementwise vector operators
245 vec &mul(const vec &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; return *this; }
246 vec &div(const vec &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; return *this; }
247 vec &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
248 vec &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
249 vec &min(const vec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }
250 vec &max(const vec &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); z = ::max(z, o.z); return *this; }
251
252 //dot products
253 float dot2(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
254 float dot2(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
255 float dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
256 float squaredot(const vec &o) const { float k = dot(o); return k*k; } //unused
257 float absdot(const vec &o) const { return fabs(x*o.x) + fabs(y*o.y) + fabs(z*o.z); } //used once
258 float zdot(const vec &o) const { return z*o.z; } //unused
259
260 //distances
261 float squaredist(const vec &e) const { return vec(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
262 float dist(const vec &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
263 float dist(const vec &e, vec &t) const { t = *this; t.sub(e); return t.magnitude(); }
264 float dist2(const vec &o) const { float dx = x-o.x, dy = y-o.y; return sqrtf(dx*dx + dy*dy); }
265
266 //cross products
267 template<class T>
268 bool reject(const T &o, float r) const { return x>o.x+r || x<o.x-r || y>o.y+r || y<o.y-r; }
269
270 template<class A, class B>
271 vec &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
272
273 vec &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
274
278 float scalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return x*(a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y) + y*(a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z) + z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); }
279 float zscalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); } //unused
280
281 //transformations
282 vec &reflectz(float rz) { z = 2*rz - z; return *this; }
283 vec &reflect(const vec &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
284 vec &project(const vec &n) { float k = dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
285 vec &projectxydir(const vec &n) { if(n.z) z = -(x*n.x/n.z + y*n.y/n.z); return *this; } //used once
286 vec &projectxy(const vec &n)
287 {
288 float m = squaredlen(), k = dot(n);
289 projectxydir(n);
290 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
291 return *this;
292 } //used once
293 vec &projectxy(const vec &n, float threshold)
294 {
295 float m = squaredlen(), k = ::min(dot(n), threshold);
296 projectxydir(n);
297 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
298 return *this;
299 } //used once
300 vec &lerp(const vec &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; z += (b.z-z)*t; return *this; }
301 vec &lerp(const vec &a, const vec &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; z = a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t; return *this; }
302 vec &avg(const vec &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
303
304 template<class B>
305 vec &madd(const vec &a, const B &b) { return add(vec(a).mul(b)); }
306
307 template<class B>
308 vec &msub(const vec &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec(a).mul(b)); }
309
310 vec &rescale(float k)
311 {
312 float mag = magnitude();
313 if(mag > 1e-6f) mul(k / mag);
314 return *this;
315 }
316
317 vec &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
318 vec &rotate_around_x(float c, float s) { float ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
319 vec &rotate_around_y(float c, float s) { float rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx+s*rz; z = c*rz-s*rx; return *this; }
320
321 vec &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
322 vec &rotate_around_x(float angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
323 vec &rotate_around_y(float angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
324
325 vec &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
326 vec &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
327 vec &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
328
329 vec &rotate(float c, float s, const vec &d)
330 {
331 *this = vec(x*(d.x*d.x*(1-c)+c) + y*(d.x*d.y*(1-c)-d.z*s) + z*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)+d.y*s),
332 x*(d.y*d.x*(1-c)+d.z*s) + y*(d.y*d.y*(1-c)+c) + z*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)-d.x*s),
333 x*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)-d.y*s) + y*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)+d.x*s) + z*(d.z*d.z*(1-c)+c));
334 return *this;
335 }
336 vec &rotate(float angle, const vec &d) { return rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), d); }
337 vec &rotate(const vec2 &sc, const vec &d) { return rotate(sc.x, sc.y, d); }
338
339 void orthogonal(const vec &d)
340 {
341 *this = fabs(d.x) > fabs(d.z) ? vec(-d.y, d.x, 0) : vec(0, -d.z, d.y);
342 }
343
344 void orthonormalize(vec &s, vec &t) const
345 {
346 s.project(*this);
347 t.project(*this).project(s);
348 } //unused
349
350 template<class T>
351 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax) const
352 {
353 return x >= bbmin.x && x <= bbmax.x && y >= bbmin.y && y <= bbmax.y && z >= bbmin.z && z <= bbmax.z;
354 }
355
356 template<class T, class U>
357 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax, U margin) const
358 {
359 return x >= bbmin.x-margin && x <= bbmax.x+margin && y >= bbmin.y-margin && y <= bbmax.y+margin && z >= bbmin.z-margin && z <= bbmax.z+margin;
360 }
361
362 template<class T, class U>
363 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size) const
364 {
365 return x >= o.x && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z && z <= o.z + size;
366 }
367
368 template<class T, class U>
369 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size, U margin) const
370 {
371 size += margin;
372 return x >= o.x-margin && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y-margin && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z-margin && z <= o.z + size;
373 }
374
375 template<class T>
376 float dist_to_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
377 {
378 float sqrdist = 0;
379 for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
380 {
381 if (v[i] < min[i])
382 {
383 float delta = v[i]-min[i];
384 sqrdist += delta*delta;
385 }
386 else if(v[i] > max[i])
387 {
388 float delta = max[i]-v[i];
389 sqrdist += delta*delta;
390 }
391 }
392 return sqrtf(sqrdist);
393 }
394
395 template<class T, class S>
396 float dist_to_bb(const T &o, S size) const
397 {
398 return dist_to_bb(o, T(o).add(size));
399 }
400
401 template<class T>
402 float project_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
403 {
404 return x*(x < 0 ? max.x : min.x) + y*(y < 0 ? max.y : min.y) + z*(z < 0 ? max.z : min.z);
405 }
406
407 static vec hexcolor(int color)
408 {
409 return vec(((color>>16)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), ((color>>8)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), (color&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f));
410 }
411
412 int tohexcolor() const
413 {
414 return (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(r, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<16) |
415 (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(g, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<8) |
416 static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(b, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255);
417 }

420inline vec2::vec2(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
421
422template<>
423struct std::hash<vec>
424{
425 size_t operator()(const vec& k) const
426 {
427 union { uint i; float f; } x, y, z;
428 x.f = k.x;
429 y.f = k.y;
430 z.f = k.z;
431 uint v = x.i^y.i^z.i;
432 return v + (v>>12);
433 }
434};
435
439struct bvec
440{
441 union
442 {
443 struct
444 {
445 uchar x, y, z;
446 };
447 struct
448 {
449 uchar r, g, b;
450 };
451 uchar v[3];
452 };
453
454 bvec() {}
455 bvec(uchar x, uchar y, uchar z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
456 explicit bvec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<uchar>((v.x+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), y(static_cast<uchar>((v.y+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), z(static_cast<uchar>((v.z+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))) {}
457 explicit bvec(const vec4<uchar> &v);
458
459 uchar &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
460 uchar operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
461
462 bool operator==(const bvec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
463 bool operator!=(const bvec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
464
465 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
466
467 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
468
469 bvec &normalize()
470 {
471 vec n(x-127.5f, y-127.5f, z-127.5f);
472 float mag = 127.5f/n.magnitude();
473 x = static_cast<uchar>(n.x*mag+127.5f);
474 y = static_cast<uchar>(n.y*mag+127.5f);
475 z = static_cast<uchar>(n.z*mag+127.5f);
476 return *this;
477 }
478
479 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, float t)
480 {
481 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
482 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
483 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
484 }
485
486 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
487 {
488 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
489 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
490 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
491 }
492
493 void flip()
494 {
495 x ^= 0x80;
496 y ^= 0x80;
497 z ^= 0x80;
498 }
499
500 void scale(int k, int d)
501 {
502 x = static_cast<uchar>((x*k)/d);
503 y = static_cast<uchar>((y*k)/d);
504 z = static_cast<uchar>((z*k)/d);
505 }
506
507 bvec &shl(int n)
508 {
509 x <<= n;
510 y <<= n;
511 z <<= n;
512 return *this;
513 }
514 bvec &shr(int n)
515 {
516 x >>= n;
517 y >>= n;
518 z >>= n;
519 return *this;
520 }
521
522 static bvec fromcolor(const vec &v)
523 {
524 return bvec(static_cast<uchar>(v.x*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.y*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.z*255.0f));
525 }
526
527 vec tocolor() const
528 {
529 return vec(x*(1.0f/255.0f), y*(1.0f/255.0f), z*(1.0f/255.0f));
530 }
531
532 static bvec from565(ushort c)
533 {
534 return bvec((((c>>11)&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6, (((c>>5)&0x3F)*259 + 35) >> 6, ((c&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6);
535 }
536
537 static bvec hexcolor(int color)
538 {
539 return bvec((color>>16)&0xFF, (color>>8)&0xFF, color&0xFF);

541
542 int tohexcolor() const
543 {
544 return (static_cast<int>(r)<<16)|(static_cast<int>(g)<<8)|static_cast<int>(b);
545 }
546};
547
556template<typename T>
557struct vec4
558{
559 union
560 {
561 struct { T x, y, z, w; };
562 struct { T r, g, b, a; };
563 T v[4];
564 uint mask;
565 };
566
567 vec4() {}
568 explicit vec4(const vec &p, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(p.z), w(w) {}
569 explicit vec4(const vec2 &p, T z = 0, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(z), w(w) {}
570 vec4(T x, T y, T z, T w) : x(x), y(y), z(z), w(w) {}
571 vec4(bvec v, uchar c)
572 {
573 x = v.x;
574 y = v.y;
575 z = v.z;
576 w = c;
577 }
578 vec4(bvec v)
579 {
580 x = v.x;
581 y = v.y;
582 z = v.z;
583 w = 0;
584 }
585
586 explicit vec4(const T *v) : x(v[0]), y(v[1]), z(v[2]), w(v[3]) {}
587
588 template<class U>
589 operator vec4<U>()
590 {
591 return vec4<U>(static_cast<U>(this->x),
592 static_cast<U>(this->y),
593 static_cast<U>(this->z),
594 static_cast<U>(this->w));
595 }
596
597 T &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
598 T operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
599
600 bool operator==(const vec4 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y && z == o.z && w == o.w; }
601 bool operator!=(const vec4 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y || z != o.z || w != o.w; }
602
613 T dot3(const vec4 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
614
625 T dot3(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
626
637 T dot(const vec4 &o) const { return dot3(o) + w*o.w; }
638
648 T dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z + w; }
649
658 T squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
659
668 T magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
669
678 T magnitude3() const { return sqrtf(dot3(*this)); }
679
687 vec4 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
688
696 vec4 &safenormalize() { T m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
697
698 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, float t)
699 {
700 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
701 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
702 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
703 w = a.w;
704 }
705
706 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
707 {
708 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
709 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
710 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
711 w = a.w;
712 }
713
714 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, const vec4<uchar> &c, float ta, float tb, float tc)
715 {
716 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x*ta + b.x*tb + c.x*tc);
717 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y*ta + b.y*tb + c.y*tc);
718 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z*ta + b.z*tb + c.z*tc);
719 w = static_cast<uchar>(a.w*ta + b.w*tb + c.w*tc);
720 }
721
727 void flip() { mask ^= 0x80808080; }
728
729 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &b, T t)
730 {
731 x += (b.x-x)*t;
732 y += (b.y-y)*t;
733 z += (b.z-z)*t;
734 w += (b.w-w)*t;
735 return *this;
736 }
737 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &a, const vec4 &b, T t)
738 {
739 x = a.x+(b.x-a.x)*t;
740 y = a.y+(b.y-a.y)*t;
741 z = a.z+(b.z-a.z)*t;
742 w = a.w+(b.w-a.w)*t;
743 return *this;
744 }
745
757 vec4 &avg(const vec4 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
758
759 template<class B>
760 vec4 &madd(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return add(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
761
762 template<class B>
763 vec4 &msub(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
764
775 vec4 &mul3(T f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
776
787 vec4 &mul(T f) { mul3(f); w *= f; return *this; }
788
800 vec4 &mul(const vec4 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; w *= o.w; return *this; }
801
813 vec4 &mul(const vec &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; return *this; }
814
823 vec4 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
824
836 vec4 &div3(T f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
837
848 vec4 &div(T f) { div3(f); w /= f; return *this; }
849
860 vec4 &div(const vec4 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; w /= o.w; return *this; }
861
872 vec4 &div(const vec &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; return *this; }
873
882 vec4 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; w = 1/w; return *this; }
883
894 vec4 &add(const vec4 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; w += o.w; return *this; }
895
907 vec4 &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
908
919 vec4 &add3(T f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
920
931 vec4 &add(T f) { add3(f); w += f; return *this; }
932
943 vec4 &addw(T f) { w += f; return *this; }
944
955 vec4 &sub(const vec4 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; w -= o.w; return *this; }
956
967 vec4 &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
968
979 vec4 &sub3(T f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
980 vec4 &sub(T f) { sub3(f); w -= f; return *this; }
981 vec4 &subw(T f) { w -= f; return *this; }
982 vec4 &neg3() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
983 vec4 &neg() { neg3(); w = -w; return *this; }
984 vec4 &clamp(T l, T h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); w = ::std::clamp(w, l, h); return *this; }
985
986
987 vec4 operator+(const vec4 &v2) const
988 {
989 return vec4(x+v2.x, y+v2.y, z+v2.z, w+v2.w);
990 }
991
992 vec4 operator-(const vec4 &v2) const
993 {
994 return vec4(x-v2.x, y-v2.y, z-v2.z, w+v2.w);
995 }
996
997 vec4 operator-() const
998 {
999 return vec4(-x, -y, -z, -w);
1000 }
1001
1002 template<typename U>
1003 vec4 operator*(const U &n) const
1004 {
1005 return vec4(n*x, n*y, n*z, n*w);
1006 }
1007
1008 vec4 operator*(const vec4 &v2) const
1009 {
1010 return vec4(x*v2.x, y*v2.y, z*v2.z, w*v2.w);
1011 }
1012
1013 template<typename U>
1014 vec4 operator/(const U &n) const
1015 {
1016 return vec4(x/n, y/n, z/n, w/n);
1017 }
1018
1019 vec4 operator/(const vec4 &v2) const
1020 {
1021 return vec4(x/v2.x, y/v2.y, z/v2.z, w/v2.w);
1022 }
1023
1024
1025 template<class A, class B>
1026 vec4 &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
1027
1028 vec4 &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
1029
1030 void setxyz(const vec &v) { x = v.x; y = v.y; z = v.z; }
1031
1032 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T c, T s) { T rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
1033 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T c, T s) { T ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
1034 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T c, T s) { T rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*rx; return *this; }
1035
1036 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1037 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1038 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1039
1040 vec4 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
1041 vec4 &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
1042 vec4 &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
1043
1044 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
1045
1046};
1047inline vec2::vec2(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
1048inline vec::vec(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}

1632
1633/*
1634
1635The engine uses 3 different linear coordinate systems
1636which are oriented around each of the axis dimensions.
1637
1638So any point within the game can be defined by four coordinates: (d, x, y, z)
1639
1640d is the reference axis dimension
1641x is the coordinate of the ROW dimension
1642y is the coordinate of the COL dimension
1643z is the coordinate of the reference dimension (DEPTH)
1644
1645typically, if d is not used, then it is implicitly the Z dimension.
1646ie: d=z => x=x, y=y, z=z
1647
1648*/
1649
1650// DIM: X=0 Y=1 Z=2.
1651const int R[3] = {1, 2, 0};
1652const int C[3] = {2, 0, 1};
1653const int D[3] = {0, 1, 2};
1655struct ivec2;
1656
1657//integer vector3
1658struct ivec
1659{
1660 union
1661 {
1662 struct
1663 {
1664 int x, y, z;
1665 };
1666 struct
1667 {
1668 int r, g, b;
1669 };
1670 int v[3];
1671 };
1672
1673 ivec() {}
1674 explicit ivec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)), z(static_cast<int>(v.z)) {}
1675 ivec(int a, int b, int c) : x(a), y(b), z(c) {}
1676 ivec(int d, int row, int col, int depth)
1677 {
1678 v[R[d]] = row;
1679 v[C[d]] = col;
1680 v[D[d]] = depth;
1681 }
1682 ivec(int i, const ivec &co, int size) : x(co.x+((i&1)>>0)*size), y(co.y+((i&2)>>1)*size), z(co.z +((i&4)>>2)*size) {}
1683 explicit ivec(const ivec2 &v, int z = 0);
1684 explicit ivec(const svec &v);
1685
1686 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1687 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1688
1689 //int idx(int i) { return v[i]; }
1690 bool operator==(const ivec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
1691 bool operator!=(const ivec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
1692 ivec operator+(const ivec &v) const { return ivec(x+v.x, y+v.y, z+v.z); }
1693 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
1694 ivec &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; z<<= n; return *this; }
1695 ivec &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; z>>= n; return *this; }
1696 ivec &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; z *= n; return *this; }
1697 ivec &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; z /= n; return *this; }
1698 ivec &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; z += n; return *this; }
1699 ivec &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; z -= n; return *this; }
1700 ivec &mul(const ivec &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; z *= v.z; return *this; }
1701 ivec &div(const ivec &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; z /= v.z; return *this; }
1702 ivec &add(const ivec &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; z += v.z; return *this; }
1703 ivec &sub(const ivec &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; z -= v.z; return *this; }
1704 ivec &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; z &= n; return *this; }
1705 ivec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
1706 ivec &min(const ivec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }
1707 ivec &max(const ivec &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); z = ::max(z, o.z); return *this; }
1708 ivec &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); z = ::min(z, n); return *this; }
1709 ivec &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); z = ::max(z, n); return *this; }
1710 ivec &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); z = ::abs(z); return *this; }
1711 ivec &clamp(int l, int h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }
1712 ivec &cross(const ivec &a, const ivec &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
1713 int dot(const ivec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
1714 float dist(const plane &p) const;
1715
1716 static inline ivec floor(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::floor(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.z))); }
1717 static inline ivec ceil(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.z))); }
1718};
1719
1720inline vec::vec(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1721
1722template<>
1723struct std::hash<ivec>
1724{
1725 size_t operator()(const ivec &k) const
1726 {
1727 return k.x^k.y^k.z;
1728 }
1729};
1730
1734struct ivec2
1735{
1736 union
1737 {
1738 struct { int x, y; };
1739 int v[2];
1740 };
1741
1742 ivec2() {}
1743 ivec2(int x, int y) : x(x), y(y) {}
1744 explicit ivec2(const vec2 &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)) {}
1745 explicit ivec2(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
1746
1747 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1748 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1749
1750 bool operator==(const ivec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
1751 bool operator!=(const ivec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
1752
1753 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
1754 ivec2 &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; return *this; }
1755 ivec2 &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; return *this; }
1756 ivec2 &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; return *this; }
1757 ivec2 &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; return *this; }
1758 ivec2 &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; return *this; }
1759 ivec2 &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; return *this; }
1760 ivec2 &mul(const ivec2 &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; return *this; }
1761 ivec2 &div(const ivec2 &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; return *this; }
1762 ivec2 &add(const ivec2 &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; return *this; }
1763 ivec2 &sub(const ivec2 &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; return *this; }
1764 ivec2 &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; return *this; }
1765 ivec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
1766 ivec2 &min(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
1767 ivec2 &max(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
1768 ivec2 &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); return *this; }
1769 ivec2 &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); return *this; }
1770 ivec2 &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); return *this; }
1771 int dot(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
1772 int cross(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
1773};
1774
1775inline ivec::ivec(const ivec2 &v, int z) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(z) {}
1776
1777inline bvec::bvec(const vec4<uchar> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}

1782struct svec
1783{
1784 union
1785 {
1786 struct { short x, y, z; };
1787 short v[3];
1788 };
1789
1790 svec() {}
1791 svec(short x, short y, short z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
1792 explicit svec(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1793
1794 short &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1795 short operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1796};
1797

1800
1804struct matrix4
1805{
1806 vec4<float> a, b, c, d;
1807
1808 template<class T, class U>
1809 T transformnormal(const U &in) const
1810 {
1811 T v;
1812 transformnormal(in, v);
1813 return v;
1814 }
1815
1816 template<class T, class U>
1817 T transform(const U &in) const
1818 {
1819 T v;
1820 transform(in, v);
1821 return v;
1822 }
1823
1824 template<class T>
1825 vec perspectivetransform(const T &in) const
1826 {
1827 vec4<float> v;
1828 transform(in, v);
1829 return vec(v).div(v.w);
1830 }
1831
1832 template<class T>
1833 void mult(const matrix4 &x, const matrix4 &y)
1834 {
1835 a = T(x.a).mul(y.a.x).madd(x.b, y.a.y).madd(x.c, y.a.z).madd(x.d, y.a.w);
1836 b = T(x.a).mul(y.b.x).madd(x.b, y.b.y).madd(x.c, y.b.z).madd(x.d, y.b.w);
1837 c = T(x.a).mul(y.c.x).madd(x.b, y.c.y).madd(x.c, y.c.z).madd(x.d, y.c.w);
1838 d = T(x.a).mul(y.d.x).madd(x.b, y.d.y).madd(x.c, y.d.z).madd(x.d, y.d.w);
1839 }
1840
1841 matrix4();
1842 matrix4(const float *m);
1843 matrix4(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c = vec(0, 0, 1));

2022//generic two dimensional vector
2023template<class T>
2024struct GenericVec2
2025{
2026 T x,y;
2027
2028 GenericVec2() {}
2029 GenericVec2(T x, T y) : x(x), y(y) {}
2030 GenericVec2(const vec2 &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
2031
2032 bool operator==(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y; }
2033 bool operator!=(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y; }
2034};
2035
2036//generic three dmensional vector
2037template<class T>
2038struct GenericVec3
2039{
2040 T x,y,z;
2041
2042 GenericVec3() {}
2043 GenericVec3(T x, T y, T z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
2044 GenericVec3(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
2045
2046 GenericVec3<T> operator+(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x+h.x, y+h.y,z+h.z); }
2047 GenericVec3<T> operator-(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x-h.x, y-h.y, z-h.z); }
2048
2049 //comparison
2050 bool operator==(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y && z == h.z; }
2051 bool operator!=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y || z != h.z; }
2052 bool operator>(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x > h.x && y > h.y && z > h.z; }
2053 bool operator<(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x < h.x && y < h.y && z < h.z; }
2054 bool operator>=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x >= h.x && y >= h.y && z >= h.z; }
2055 bool operator<=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x <= h.x && y <= h.y && z <= h.z; }
2056};

2063extern const vec2 sincos360[];
2074inline int mod360(int angle)
2075{
2076 if(angle < 0)
2077 {
2078 angle = 360 + (angle <= -360 ? angle%360 : angle);
2079 }
2080 else if(angle >= 360)
2081 {
2082 angle %= 360;
2083 }
2084 return angle;
2085}
2086
2094inline const vec2 &sincosmod360(int angle) { return sincos360[mod360(angle)]; }
2095
2105inline float cos360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].x; }
2106
2116inline float sin360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].y; }
2117
2127inline float tan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.y/sc.x; }
2128
2138inline float cotan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.x/sc.y; }
